newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks seen weaker, investors remain cautiou.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks seen weaker, investors remain cautiou.

text.p: Dhaka stocks are expected to extend their fall on Monday as recent losses are likely to keep investors wary, brokers said. "The market is now falling without much logic. We expected buyers to return on Sunday. But it didn't happen," said broker Sabbir Ahmed. The benchmark index of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) lost 24.48 points or 2.44 percent to 977.78 on tur

DHAKA, July 21 (Reuter)- Dhaka stocks are expected to extend their fall on Monday as recent losses are likely to keep investors wary, brokers said. "The market is now falling without much logic. We expected buyers to return on Sunday. But it didn't happen," said broker Sabbir Ahmed. The benchmark index of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) lost 24.48 points or 2.44 percent to 977.78 on turnover of 33.1 million taka on Sunday. -- Dhaka Newsroom +880-2-506363
